modName: The Shire And Unique Border Gates Patch
summary: As requested; this is a simple patch to make Duinnin's Unique Border Gates compatible with TheBawb's The Shire. Both mods edit the gate near Riften and were conflicting prior to this patch.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Arial][color=#00ffff][b][size=5]What is this Mod?[/size][/b][/color][/font]

As requested on Reditt; this is a simple patch to make Duinnin's Unique Border Gates compatible with TheBawb's The Shire. Both mods edit the gate near Riften and were conflicting prior to this patch.

[font=Arial][color=#00ffff][b][size=5]
Requirements?[/size][/b][/color][/font]

Neither mods require DLCs, or any script extenders. But this patch does require the mods themselves:

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84460?tab=description]The Shire
[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52296?tab=description]Unique Border Gates
[/url]


[font=Arial][b][color=#00ffff][size=5]Installation:[/size][/color][/b][/font]

1) Install The Shire and then Unique Border Gates.
﻿ ﻿OR
2) Install Unique Border Gates and Then The Shire.
[img width=337,height=333]http://i0.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/facebook/000/019/499/promoguy.jpg[/img]

3) Install this patch last. Ensure that it is below the other two in your load order.
This patch is comprised of solely an ESP. To uninstall, simply delete it from your data folder.

[font=Arial][b][color=#00ffff][size=5]
Do you take patch requests?[/size][/color][/b][/font]

Depends. As I recently re-picked up support for The Shire I tend to take reasonable requests for that project. As for others; probably not. Between military life, Unreal engine projects, and upkeeping The Shire I tend to be booked most days. But what the hell, drop the idea in the comments and see what happens.

author: TheBawb
